description: <bulletlist>At the start of the battle, gain 2 <hyperlink>Magelock Cannon</hyperlink> units on the attacker's side until the end of battle.<bullet>Only one type of Siegecraft unit can be brought into <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>. If multiple <hyperlink>Siege Projects</hyperlink> would bring them, only the strongest of them will appear.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Construct Siege Guns

description: At the start of the battle, gain <hyperlink>Great Bombard</hyperlink> on the attacker's side until the end of battle. <bulletlist><bullet>Great Bombard is an immobile Siegecraft <hyperlink>Unit</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet> Only one type of Siegecraft unit can be brought into <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>. If multiple <hyperlink>Siege Projects</hyperlink> would bring them, only the strongest of them will appear.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Construct Great Bombard

description: Requires a captured Fallen Tower <hyperlink>Ancient Wonder</hyperlink>.
name: Wizard's Bombardment

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Besieged <hyperlink>City</hyperlink> loses -2 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Closest owned <hyperlink>City</hyperlink> gains +2 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>At the start of the battle, all enemy units have -10<happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink> until the end of battle.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Subjugating Raid

description: <bulletlist><bullet>No towers will be present to aid the defender in battle.</bullet><bullet>Each turn in combat up to 3 random enemies:<bulletlist></bullet><bullet>Become Electrified.</bullet><bullet>Sustain either 10 <damageFire></damageFire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink>, 10 <damageLightning></damageLightning> <hyperlink>Lightning Damage</hyperlink>, or 10 <damageFrost></damageFrost> <hyperlink>Frost Damage</hyperlink> .</bullet></bulletlist></bulletlist>
name: Arcane Maelstrom

description: <bulletlist><bullet>At the start of the battle, gain 2 <hyperlink>Earthshatter Engine</hyperlink> units on the attacker's side until the end of battle.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Earthshatter Engines</hyperlink> are Siegecraft <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> with short range, area of effect attacks that can destroy obstacles and knock enemy units out of <hyperlink>Defense Mode</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Only one type of Siegecraft unit can be brought into <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>. If multiple <hyperlink>Siege Projects</hyperlink> would bring them, only the strongest of them will appear.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Create Earthshatter Engines

description: <bulletlist><bullet>At the start of the battle, gain 6 <hyperlink>War Hound</hyperlink> units on the attacker's side until the end of battle.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Unleash the War Hounds

description: At the start of the battle, enemy units:<bulletlist><bullet>Are displaced by 4 hexes.</bullet><bullet>Gain Misfortune.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sow Confusion

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Damages the Support Defense Structure in the city.</bullet><bullet>No support effect will be present to aid the defender in battle.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sabotage Support

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Damages the Battlement Defense Structure in the city.</bullet><bullet>No Battlements will be present in battle to aid the defender.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Break Battlements

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Additional wall breaches appear at the start of combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Undermining the Walls

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Half of the defender's Tower <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> are destroyed at the start of combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Tower Bombardment

description: <bulletlist><bullet>After 1 <turn></turn> in battle, 3 enemy non-<hyperlink>Hero</hyperlink> units are Mind-Controlled until the end of combat.</bullet><bullet>The city suffers -50 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink> while it is besieged.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Incite Rebellion

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Units besieging the city take 20 <damagePhysical></damagePhysical> <hyperlink>Physical Damage</hyperlink> at the start of combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Headlong Assault

description: <bulletlist><bullet>At the start of the battle, gain 2 <hyperlink>Onagers</hyperlink> on the attacker's side until the end of battle.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Onagers</hyperlink> are immobile Siegecraft <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> with long range, area of effect attacks that are great for destroying obstacles, but are inaccurate against <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>Only one type of Siegecraft unit can be brought into <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>. If multiple <hyperlink>Siege Projects</hyperlink> would bring them, only the strongest of them will appear.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Construct Onagers

description: <bulletlist><bullet>At the start of battle, the attacker gains 2 <hyperlink>Devastator Sphere</hyperlink> until the end of battle.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Devastator Spheres</hyperlink> are Siegecraft <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> that can detonate themselves into target obstacle or <hyperlink>Unit</hyperlink> to deal massive damage and destroy obstacles.</bullet><bullet>Only one type of Siegecraft unit can be brought into <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>. If multiple <hyperlink>Siege Projects</hyperlink> would bring them, only the strongest of them will appear.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Construct Devastator Spheres

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Units defending the city take 20 <damagePhysical></damagePhysical> <hyperlink>Physical Damage</hyperlink> at the start of combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Harass Defenders

description: At the start of combat units defending the city:<bulletlist><bullet>Suffer 16 <damageBlight></damageBlight> <hyperlink>Blight Damage</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Suffer 2x Poisoned.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Fumigation

description: At the start of combat:<bulletlist><bullet>Units defending the city take 26 <damageFire></damageFire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Units defending the city have a base 90% of becoming Burning.</bullet><bullet>Fires are randomly added.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Dragon Attack

description: <bulletlist><bullet>You gain +40 <souls></souls> <hyperlink>Souls</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>At the start of the battle:<bulletlist></bullet><bullet>Gain 6 <hyperlink>Decaying Zombie</hyperlink> units.</bullet><bullet>All enemy units gain Soulbound.</bullet></bulletlist></bulletlist>
name: Construct Soul Siphons

description: <bulletlist>At the start of the battle, gain 2 <hyperlink>Bolt Repeater</hyperlink> units on the attacker's side until the end of battle.<bullet> <hyperlink>Bolt Repeaters</hyperlink> are immobile Siegecraft <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> with long range area of effect attacks that are repeating, unlike <hyperlink>Onagers</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Only one type of Siegecraft unit can be brought into <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>. If multiple <hyperlink>Siege Projects</hyperlink> would bring them, only the strongest of them will appear.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Construct Bolt Repeaters

description: At the start of the battle, attacking units gain 10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink> and defending units lose 10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink>.
name: Revels of Blood

description: At the start of combat, towers, battlements and additional wall obstacles are destroyed.
name: Tremor Ritual

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Every 2 turns in combat, a random enemy is hit by the Ice Coffin spell.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Winterfreeze Evocation

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Every 2 turns in combat, a random enemy is hit by the Fulmination spell.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Autumnstorm Evocation

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Every 2 turns in combat, a random ally is healed by the Healing Roots spell.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Springvine Evocation

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Every 2 turns in combat, a random enemy is hit by the Ignite spell.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Summerburst Evocation

description: <bulletlist><bullet>While besieged, the city loses -1 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink> each <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>. When it reaches 0 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink>, the city will be razed.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Captivating Mists
